title: Melanoma-associated variants tested by MPRAs in melanoma and primary melanocyte cell lines (for more details, see https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ajhg.2022.11.006)

columns.name: ref_vs_alt_FDR.(UACC903_melanoma)
columns.label: ref_vs_alt_FDR (UACC903_melanoma)
columns.description: allelic effect FDR (two-sided Wald test) in UACC903 melanoma cell line

columns.name: log2_FC_alt.(UACC903_melanoma)
columns.label: log2_FC_alt (UACC903_melanoma)
columns.description: log2 fold difference of allelic transcriptional activity normalized to DNA input in UACC903

columns.name: ref_vs_alt_FDR.(melanocyte)
columns.label: ref_vs_alt_FDR (melanocyte)
columns.description: allelic effect FDR (two-sided Wald test) in immortalized human primary melanocytes

columns.name: log2_FC_alt.(melanocyte)
columns.label: log2_FC_alt (melanocyte)
columns.description: log2 fold difference of allelic transcriptional activity normalized to DNA input in melanocytes

columns.name: Activator.(UACC903_melanoma)
columns.label: Activator (UACC903_melanoma)
columns.description: Either allele shows higher normalized expression than the average of all the variants tested in UACC903

columns.name: Activator.(melanocyte)
columns.label: Activator (melanocyte)
columns.description: Either allele shows higher normalized expression than the average of all the variants tested in melanocytes

columns.name: Cell.type.specificity
columns.label: Cell type specificity
columns.description: Based on cell-type-specific MPRA score, activator score, and differentially expressed TF binding affinity

columns.name: Integrative.score.from.Long.et.al
columns.label: Integrative score from Long et al
columns.description: Score combining melanoma/melanocyte MPRA, activator, open chromatin region, histone, FINEMAP/POLYFUN, and motif scores
